thread.title: Greece's Tsipras sworn in as new prime minister
thread.title_full: Greece's Tsipras sworn in as new prime minister | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Greece's Tsipras sworn in as new prime minister
text:
ATHENS, Sept 21 Leftist leader Alexis Tsipras was sworn in as prime minister of Greece on Monday after sweeping to victory for a second term in parliamentary elections on Sunday.
Tsipras took a civil oath of allegiance to the Greek constitution, in a break from common practice which is normally in the presence of religious leaders. (Reporting By Karolina Tagaris; writing by Michele Kambas )
